name: Guardian of the Sands
description: Powerful guardians stand watch over the tomb of an ancient horror, so that it may never threaten the world again. But they may already be too late...

skinlines.name: Guardian of the Sands
skinlines.description: Powerful guardians stand watch over the tomb of an ancient horror, so that it may never threaten the world again. But they may already be too late...

skinlines.name: Pharaoh
skinlines.description: Though their empires were swallowed by the sands, mighty Pharaohs once ruled the sun-baked dunes of the Great Desert.
